agents.name: Science Content Reviewer
goals: Evaluate scientific accuracy of biological information about jumping spiders
Assess appropriate use of scientific terminology and vocabulary
Check content depth and explanation quality for high school level
Ensure safety considerations and ethical pet care practices are included

agents.name: Writing Style & Organization Reviewer
goals: Evaluate essay organization and structural coherence
Assess academic writing style and tone appropriateness
Review grammar, mechanics, and technical writing skills

agents.name: Evidence & Detail Reviewer
goals: Evaluate use of specific examples and concrete details
Assess inclusion of quantitative data and measurements
Check adequacy of supporting evidence for claims
Review practical applicability and actionability of instructions

agents.name: Critical Thinking & Analysis Reviewer
goals: Assess balance of analytical versus purely descriptive content
Check for connections between different biological concepts
Look for evidence of higher-order thinking beyond basic facts
